attributes.action: force MPs who have agreed to step down at the next election to resign with immediate effect and to forego any expenses or allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: outgoing members of parliament should not benefit from an extended term in office with full pay and resettlement allowances at the end of that term following having been found out with regard to claiming expenses that were tantamount to fraud and not in accordance with the agreed rules for claims for use in connection with their official duties

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
